source: TEXT_SUBPST013_01573_SEQ_00<tab>The deputy postmoogle holds a colorful, heavily perfumed envelope in his paw.
target: TEXT_SUBPST013_01573_SEQ_00<tab>先輩レターモーグリは、冒険者に敏腕美容師への手紙を託したいようだ。

source: TEXT_SUBPST013_01573_SEQ_01<tab>The deputy postmoogle has foisted another assignment on you, as is his wont. Play the willing assistant and deliver the garishly decorated missive to a certain gentleman of heightened aesthetic sensibilities who has been seen about Limsa Lominsa.
target: TEXT_SUBPST013_01573_SEQ_01<tab>先輩レターモーグリから、配達を依頼された。リムサ・ロミンサで目撃されたという「敏腕美容師らしき男」に、手紙を配達しよう。

source: TEXT_SUBPST013_01573_SEQ_02<tab>The man thought to be the renowned aesthetician Jandelaine was in fact his brother, a staid youth by the name of Guillefresne. He informs you that he, in fact, is the author of the missive you carry, explaining that he has traveled from Ishgard to convince his brother to return home and succeed their stricken father as lord of the family domain. Hearing from the chatty madam that Jandelaine has gone to procure a new comb, Guillefresne sets out for the Carpenters' Guild in Gridania. Pursue the youth and speak with Master Beatin.
target: TEXT_SUBPST013_01573_SEQ_02<tab>敏腕美容師らしき男に手紙を配達したところ、人違いだった。誤配送した相手は、敏腕美容師の弟ギユフレーヌで、彼こそ手紙の送り主だった。彼は、兄で美容師のジャンドゥレーヌに家督を継がせるため、行方を捜しているという。マダムの話を聞いたギユフレーヌは、グリダニアの木工師ギルドへ向かった。手紙を配達するため、グリダニアの木工師ギルドにいる「ベアティヌ」に、敏腕美容師の行方を聞いてみよう。

source: TEXT_SUBPST013_01573_SEQ_03<tab>Master Beatin is seemingly unconvinced that Guillefresne has his brother's best interests at heart. He tells the youth a cryptic tale, instructing him to ponder on its meaning as he journeys to Ul'dah, where Jandelaine has gone to consult with Guildmaster Severian of the Alchemists' Guild.
target: TEXT_SUBPST013_01573_SEQ_03<tab>ベアティヌと話した。ギユフレーヌは、ジャンドゥレーヌを追って、ウルダハの錬金術師ギルドへ向かった。冒険者も、ウルダハの錬金術師ギルドにいる「セヴェリアン」と話そう。

source: TEXT_SUBPST013_01573_SEQ_04<tab>Adamantly opposed to the notion of his fellow genius returning to Ishgard, Severian stubbornly refuses to provide Guillefresne with any information on his brother's whereabouts, until he has a sudden change of heart for reasons unknown. Travel to the Adventurers' Guild in Limsa, that you might at long last deliver the letter to the man for whom it was intended.
target: TEXT_SUBPST013_01573_SEQ_04<tab>セヴェリアンと話した。ギユフレーヌの目的を知ったセヴェリアンは、ジャンドゥレーヌの居場所を明かした。リムサ・ロミンサの冒険者ギルド付近にいる「ジャンドゥレーヌ」に、「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8A2501 /var>」を配達しよう。

source: TEXT_SUBPST013_01573_SEQ_05<tab>You successfully deliver the letter to Jandelaine. Guillefresne confronts his brother, strongly insisting that the aesthetician abandon his profession and return to the family lands in Ishgard. Jandelaine responds with a flourish of his blades, giving his timid brother stately locks that instill him with newfound confidence and resolve. Now enlightened as to the true callings of both sibling and self, the reborn Guillefresne swears to do his family proud before bidding both you and his brother farewell.
target: TEXT_SUBPST013_01573_SEQ_05<tab>ジャンドゥレーヌへの配達を完了した。ジャンドゥレーヌは、弟ギユフレーヌを新生させ、家督を継ぐ決意を促した。人には、それぞれ果たすべき使命があるようだ。もしも人生に迷ったら、宿屋でジャンドゥレーヌを呼び出して、生まれ変わらせてもらおう。

source: TEXT_SUBPST013_01573_TODO_00<tab>Deliver the perfumed letter to the well-groomed gentleman in Limsa Lominsa.
target: TEXT_SUBPST013_01573_TODO_00<tab>敏腕美容師らしき男に<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8A2501 /var>を配達

source: TEXT_SUBPST013_01573_TODO_01<tab>Speak with Beatin at the Carpenters' Guild in Gridania.
target: TEXT_SUBPST013_01573_TODO_01<tab>木工師ギルドのベアティヌと話す

source: TEXT_SUBPST013_01573_TODO_02<tab>Speak with Severian at the Alchemists' Guild in Ul'dah.
target: TEXT_SUBPST013_01573_TODO_02<tab>錬金術師ギルドのセヴェリアンと話す

source: TEXT_SUBPST013_01573_TODO_03<tab>Deliver the perfumed letter to Jandelaine in Limsa Lominsa.
target: TEXT_SUBPST013_01573_TODO_03<tab>リムサ・ロミンサのジャンドゥレーヌに<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8A2501 /var>を配達

source: TEXT_SUBPST013_01573_LETTERMOOGLE_000_000<tab>Now <var 1A 02 /var>here's<var 1A 01 /var> the kind of enthusiasm I like to see! My hardest-working assistant, back to hone <var 08 E905 ((her)) ((his)) /var> skills─and ease <var 08 E905 ((her)) ((his)) /var> beloved supervisor's burden in the process, kupo!
target:
TEXT_SUBPST013_01573_LETTERMOOGLE_000_000<tab>後輩君の実力がメキメキあがって、モグは嬉しいクポ！
そんな頼もしい後輩君に、難しい配達をお願いしたいクポ！

source: TEXT_SUBPST013_01573_LETTERMOOGLE_000_001<tab>Well, it just so happens that I've <var 1A 02 /var>just<var 1A 01 /var> the assignment for you. Do you see this most extravagant envelope in my paw? It contains a missive addressed to none other than one Master Jandelaine, the realm-renowned aesthetician.
target:
TEXT_SUBPST013_01573_LETTERMOOGLE_000_001<tab>届け先は……
敏腕美容師のジャンドゥレーヌさんクポ！

source: TEXT_SUBPST013_01573_LETTERMOOGLE_000_002<tab>Oh, what I would not give to have my whiskers trimmed by those magic scissors! To feel the caress of his fine-toothed comb across my fur! Ahem, but this is neither hither nor thither, kupo.
target:
TEXT_SUBPST013_01573_LETTERMOOGLE_000_002<tab>敏腕美容師さんは、お仕事にとっても厳しいクポ！
仕事中はお手紙を受け取ってくれないから、
仕事をしていない瞬間を狙いすますしかないクポ！

source: TEXT_SUBPST013_01573_LETTERMOOGLE_000_003<tab>But where were we? Ah, yes. I need not tell you that the man is very, ah, <var 1A 02 /var>devoted<var 1A 01 /var> to his art. Doubtless he would not even think of accepting such personal correspondence while otherwise occupied with his work.
target:
TEXT_SUBPST013_01573_LETTERMOOGLE_000_003<tab>敏腕美容師さんは、商売道具がないと錯乱するクポ！
だから、もしかするとお仕事じゃないときは、
とっても地味な感じに見えるかもしれないクポ！

source: TEXT_SUBPST013_01573_LETTERMOOGLE_000_004<tab>Fortunately, I am told that he has been sighted about town of late. Enjoying a hard-earned vacation? Seeking inspiration for his newest hairstyles? I cannot say─only that if there is any opportunity to deliver this letter, it is now. Godsspeed, my loyal friend, kupo!
target:
TEXT_SUBPST013_01573_LETTERMOOGLE_000_004<tab>ちょうど、リムサ・ロミンサのリムレーン像付近で、
地味な感じの「敏腕美容師らしき男」が目撃されてるクポ！
行ってみてほしいクポ！

source: TEXT_SUBPST013_01573_LETTERMOOGLE_000_005<tab>Master Jandelaine is very, ah, <var 1A 02 /var>devoted<var 1A 01 /var> to his art. Doubtless he would not even think of accepting such personal correspondence while otherwise occupied with his work.
target:
TEXT_SUBPST013_01573_LETTERMOOGLE_000_005<tab>敏腕美容師さんへの配達を、お願いするクポ！
でも、仕事中はお手紙を受け取ってくれないから、
仕事をしていない瞬間に渡すしかないクポ！

source: TEXT_SUBPST013_01573_LETTERMOOGLE_000_006<tab>Fortunately, I am told that he has been sighted about town of late. Enjoying a hard-earned vacation? Seeking inspiration for his newest hairstyles? I cannot say─only that if there is any opportunity to deliver this letter, it is now. Godsspeed, my loyal friend, kupo!
target:
TEXT_SUBPST013_01573_LETTERMOOGLE_000_006<tab>ちょうどリムサ・ロミンサのリムレーン像付近で
地味な感じの「敏腕美容師らしき男」が目撃されてるクポ！
駆けつけてみてほしいクポ！

source: TEXT_SUBPST013_01573_GOFUJINN_000_010<tab>Wedded bliss! Eternal happiness! Mine, at long last, and I have this man to thank for it all! How can I even begin to express my gratitude?
target:
TEXT_SUBPST013_01573_GOFUJINN_000_010<tab>ああ、幸せすぎてコワイ……。
私たちの結婚式も、もうすぐ。
すべては私が生まれ変わった、あの日から始まったのね……。

source: TEXT_SUBPST013_01573_GUILLEFRESNE_000_010<tab>What a ravishing lady. Her husband-to-be is quite a fortunate man, would you not─hm? You've a delivery for me?
target:
TEXT_SUBPST013_01573_GUILLEFRESNE_000_010<tab>見てください、このマダムの麗しさを。
そばにいるだけで、幸福だと思いませんか……。
おや……私宛の手紙ですか？

source: TEXT_SUBPST013_01573_GUILLEFRESNE_000_011<tab>...I fear there must be some mistake. I can assure you that this letter is not intended for me, as it was I who penned it.
target:
TEXT_SUBPST013_01573_GUILLEFRESNE_000_011<tab>……むむ、この手紙は私が書いたもの。
どうやら貴方は、私を美容師と間違えておられるようですね。

source: TEXT_SUBPST013_01573_GUILLEFRESNE_000_012<tab>That said, I suppose 'tis no wonder that I am oft mistaken for my brother. We do share a certain family resemblance.
target:
TEXT_SUBPST013_01573_GUILLEFRESNE_000_012<tab>……ですが、それも無理からぬことです。
なぜなら私は、ジャンドゥレーヌの弟ですから。

source: TEXT_SUBPST013_01573_GOFUJINN_000_013<tab>Y-Your brother!? Why, now that you mention it... Good gods, you're like two jade peas in a pod!
target:
TEXT_SUBPST013_01573_GOFUJINN_000_013<tab>本当に、うりふたつよね！
私も、先ほど話しかけられたとき、
敏腕美容師様が現れたのかと思ったもの！

source: TEXT_SUBPST013_01573_GOFUJINN_000_014<tab>And, wait a moment...I know you, too! You're the <var 08 E905 ((woman)) ((man)) /var> who brought about my rebirth! The one who guided me from the shadows of self-doubt to a fashionable new world of assurance and aplomb!
target:
TEXT_SUBPST013_01573_GOFUJINN_000_014<tab>……って、あなたは私の恩人さんじゃない！？
あなたのおかげで、私、今度結婚するのよ！

source: TEXT_SUBPST013_01573_GOFUJINN_000_015<tab>To think that the man I first thought some depraved killer would prove to be my savior. And it was you─yes, you─who showed me the light. Why, thanks to you two, one of the most eligible bachelors in all of Limsa now seeks my hand in marriage!
target:
TEXT_SUBPST013_01573_GOFUJINN_000_015<tab>あの時、あなたが敏腕美容師様を助けてくれたから、
私は生まれ変わることができたわ。
おかげで自信がみなぎって……求婚できたの！

source: TEXT_SUBPST013_01573_GUILLEFRESNE_000_016<tab>I daresay, milady, that this comes as little surprise. Only a blind man or a fool could fail to recognize your radiant beauty.
target:
TEXT_SUBPST013_01573_GUILLEFRESNE_000_016<tab>そのような馴れ初めだったのですね……。
これほど美しい方と夫婦になれるとは、旦那様は果報者ですよ。

source: TEXT_SUBPST013_01573_GOFUJINN_000_017<tab>Tee hee─quite the charmer, you are! But you must understand, it was your brother who brought out the beauty inside me. Should you encounter him in your travels, do pass along my gratitude, Master...?
target:
TEXT_SUBPST013_01573_GOFUJINN_000_017<tab>うふふ、敏腕美容師様のおかげよ！
……そうそう、こちらの弟さんは美容師様を捜して、
はるばるイシュガルドからいらっしゃったんですって！

source: TEXT_SUBPST013_01573_GUILLEFRESNE_000_018<tab>(-Guillefresne-)Ah, but where are my manners? I am Guillefresne, of House...well, you are not like to know of us, but perhaps you do know of House Dzemael, with whom we share common ancestry.
target:
TEXT_SUBPST013_01573_GUILLEFRESNE_000_018<tab>(-ギユフレーヌ-)ギユフレーヌと申します、お見知り置きを。
我が一族は、イシュガルド四大名家のひとつ……
ゼーメル家の傍流にあたる、由緒正しき家柄です。

source: TEXT_SUBPST013_01573_GUILLEFRESNE_000_019<tab>(-Guillefresne-)It is a matter related to my house─more precisely, its line of succession─that has brought me to this nation. Our father, you see, has been stricken with an illness most grave.
target:
TEXT_SUBPST013_01573_GUILLEFRESNE_000_019<tab>(-ギユフレーヌ-)……この度、父が病に倒れてしまい、
至急、後継を立てねばならなくなりました。

source: TEXT_SUBPST013_01573_GUILLEFRESNE_000_021<tab>(-Guillefresne-)Though he yet clings to life, his strength wanes with each passing day. In a moon's time, we will need an heir─and there is only one man in the realm who can fill that role.
target:
TEXT_SUBPST013_01573_GUILLEFRESNE_000_021<tab>(-ギユフレーヌ-)愚兄ジャンドゥレーヌが、故郷イシュガルドを離れ、
髪いじりなどにうつつをぬかして、早5年……。
そろそろ家督を継ぐという使命を果たしてもらわねば！

source: TEXT_SUBPST013_01573_GUILLEFRESNE_000_022<tab>(-Guillefresne-)For the past five years, I said nothing as my elder brother idled away his days crafting coiffures, but I can remain silent no longer! A duty far greater than the trimming of locks calls Jandelaine back to Ishgard, and I shall not leave this realm until he stands at my side!
target:
TEXT_SUBPST013_01573_GUILLEFRESNE_000_022<tab>(-ギユフレーヌ-)貴方が、届けようとしてくださった手紙も、
愚兄に帰郷を促すために、私がしたためたもの……。

source: TEXT_SUBPST013_01573_GOFUJINN_000_023<tab>Master Jandelaine...of noble birth!? He always did have a most dignified air about him. If you are looking for your brother, he mentioned something about heading off to procure a new comb. Only the finest of tools for my wedding day, he said.
target:
TEXT_SUBPST013_01573_GOFUJINN_000_023<tab>まあ、敏腕美容師様って、貴族のボンボンだったのね！
……そういえば、結婚式のヘアメイクを依頼したときに、
美容師様は、櫛（くし）を新調するって言ってたわよ。

source: TEXT_SUBPST013_01573_GUILLEFRESNE_000_024<tab>(-Guillefresne-)A comb! The Carpenters' Guild is located in the nation of Gridania, is it not? I suspect that is where we will find my brother. We must away at once!
target:
TEXT_SUBPST013_01573_GUILLEFRESNE_000_024<tab>(-ギユフレーヌ-)なるほど、でしたらグリダニア……
木工師ギルドに現れる可能性が高そうですね。
早速、向かわねばなりませんが、その前に……。

source: TEXT_SUBPST013_01573_GUILLEFRESNE_000_025<tab>(-Guillefresne-)I trust that you will see this missive delivered safely to my brother's hands. I have a pressing matter to attend to, but will join you in Gridania as soon as I am able. Safe travels to you, and good day, milady.
target:
TEXT_SUBPST013_01573_GUILLEFRESNE_000_025<tab>(-ギユフレーヌ-)この手紙は、配達士さんにお返しします。
連絡を付けるため、どうか兄に届けていただけますか。
……それでは、ごきげんよう。

source: TEXT_SUBPST013_01573_GOFUJINN_000_026<tab>Well, that young man certainly dashed off in a hurry. If you've a mind to deliver that letter to his brother, you'd best make for the Carpenters' Guild, and quickly.
target:
TEXT_SUBPST013_01573_GOFUJINN_000_026<tab>あらら、飛んで行っちゃった……。
美容師様に手紙を届けるつもりなら、
あなたも、木工師ギルドの「ベアティヌ」さんを訪ねたら？

source: TEXT_SUBPST013_01573_GOFUJINN_000_029<tab>If you've a mind to deliver that letter to his brother, you'd best hurry off to the Carpenters' Guild. Oh, I simply cannot wait to see what magic Master Jandelaine will work upon these locks for my wedding day!
target:
TEXT_SUBPST013_01573_GOFUJINN_000_029<tab>美容師様に手紙を届けるつもりなら、
あなたも、木工師ギルドの「ベアティヌ」さんを訪ねたら？
……それにしても、ああ、幸せすぎてコワイ。

source: TEXT_SUBPST013_01573_GUILLEFRESNE_000_030<tab>I can scarce believe the tales that Master Beatin tells. Have the years away from Ishgard truly changed my brother so?
target:
TEXT_SUBPST013_01573_GUILLEFRESNE_000_030<tab>ベアティヌさんから出てくる話は、兄の知らない面ばかり……。
家族には見せない顔があるのでしょうか。

source: TEXT_SUBPST013_01573_BEATINE_000_030<tab>Looking for Jandelaine, are you? As I just told his brother, the man conducted his business, then went on his way.
target:
TEXT_SUBPST013_01573_BEATINE_000_030<tab>……おや、貴方もジャンドゥレーヌさんをお探しですか？
弟さんにも伝えたところなのですが……
彼は……つい先ほど、ここを出発したところです。

source: TEXT_SUBPST013_01573_GUILLEFRESNE_000_031<tab>Bah! How can my brother so flippantly forsake duty and family!? It makes not a whit of sense!
target:
TEXT_SUBPST013_01573_GUILLEFRESNE_000_031<tab>兄上ときたら……
果たすべき使命を投げ出し、いつまで放蕩するつもりだ！

source: TEXT_SUBPST013_01573_BEATINE_000_032<tab>Perhaps not to you. It would seem you have thoroughly convinced yourself that Jandelaine is the one best suited for this duty you would ask of him.
target:
TEXT_SUBPST013_01573_BEATINE_000_032<tab>その件についてなのですが……
貴方は……本当にジャンドゥレーヌさんが家業を継ぐに、
ふさわしいとお考えですか……？

source: TEXT_SUBPST013_01573_GUILLEFRESNE_000_033<tab>You would suggest he is not!? I'll not stand by while you besmirch my brother's good name!
target:
TEXT_SUBPST013_01573_GUILLEFRESNE_000_033<tab>……放蕩の限りを尽くす兄では、
当主としての務めを果たせないとでも！？

source: TEXT_SUBPST013_01573_GUILLEFRESNE_000_034<tab>While it is true that in recent days he is little more than a glorified beard-trimmer, I saw Jandelaine serve as our father's right hand since he was scarcely a man grown! He was the very paragon of duty and honor─an example to all around him!
target:
TEXT_SUBPST013_01573_GUILLEFRESNE_000_034<tab>兄は、出奔するまでの間、
父の仕事を見事に補佐していましたよ！
……兄は、私の永遠の目標なのです！

source: TEXT_SUBPST013_01573_BEATINE_000_035<tab>Calm yourself, boy. I hold your brother in the highest esteem. It is precisely for this reason that I speak as I do. Allow me to tell you a tale.
target:
TEXT_SUBPST013_01573_BEATINE_000_035<tab>ジャンドゥレーヌさんが才能豊かなのは確か……。
彼の……椰子の如く、しなやかな発想と行動には……
いつも驚かされるばかりです……。

source: TEXT_SUBPST013_01573_BEATINE_000_036<tab>Once upon a time there lived a young carpenter. He was possessed of some talent and great zeal for his craft, and his masters were convinced that the boy would come to great things in the guild. But, ah, the road to success is fraught with many perils...
target:
TEXT_SUBPST013_01573_BEATINE_000_036<tab>……初めて彼と出会ったときの話です。
すれ違い様に……突然、切りつけられて……
私は、この髪形に生まれ変わっていました。

source:
TEXT_SUBPST013_01573_BEATINE_000_037<tab>After suffering the loss of a...close friend...the youth began to lose his way. Racked with despair, he let both mind and body go to waste. His close-cropped coif grew to a rampant snarl, obstructing his field of vision and getting tangled in his hands as he wielded his hammer.
His works suffered, and his masters began to ask if he might not consider another profession.
target:
TEXT_SUBPST013_01573_BEATINE_000_037<tab>ジャンドゥレーヌさんに出会うまで……
私の前髪は……柳のごとく長く……作業を妨げていたのです。

source: TEXT_SUBPST013_01573_BEATINE_000_038<tab>One day, as he shambled to the workshop, he was ambushed by a strange man wielding twin blades. Before he could even realize what was happening, his tangled locks lay on the ground in a scattered heap. In that moment, he came to a realization.
target:
TEXT_SUBPST013_01573_BEATINE_000_038<tab>生まれ変わってからは集中力が増し……
木との対話にのめりこみ、気づけばギルドマスターに……。
ですから……今も、この髪型を貫いているんです。

source:
TEXT_SUBPST013_01573_BEATINE_000_039<tab>Thanking the man for his services, he returned to his workshop. As if by magic, the youth wielded his tools with a newfound focus and confidence. Works of surpassing quality emerged from his hands, and he reclaimed his status as the guild's rising star.
Today, he stands before you as timbermaster, wearing his hair in the same fashion as he did the day of his rebirth.
target:
TEXT_SUBPST013_01573_BEATINE_000_039<tab>私は……木工のことしかわかりませんが……
木には……生育に適した環境があるものです……。
さて、ジャンドゥレーヌさんは……どうでしょう？

source: TEXT_SUBPST013_01573_BEATINE_000_040<tab>Plant a sapling in the Twelveswood and one day it shall grow into a mighty oak. Plant it on a snowy crag in Coerthas and it is not like to survive the first winter. If you would seek out your brother, pray consider these words. You will find him at the Alchemists' Guild in Ul'dah.
target:
TEXT_SUBPST013_01573_BEATINE_000_040<tab>彼に相応しい環境は何処か……
考えながら、追ってみてください……。
次の目的地は……ウルダハの錬金術師ギルドのようですよ。

source: TEXT_SUBPST013_01573_GUILLEFRESNE_000_041<tab>I thank you, my good man! While I cannot say that the moral of the tale is immediately clear to me, I will take some time to ponder your words on my journey. Fare thee well!
target:
TEXT_SUBPST013_01573_GUILLEFRESNE_000_041<tab>兄に相応しい環境……？
考えてみます……ありがとうございました。

source: TEXT_SUBPST013_01573_BEATINE_000_042<tab>Like a sturdy cedar, growing strong and true, that boy. But allow cedar to dry overmuch, and it is quick to splinter and shatter...
target:
TEXT_SUBPST013_01573_BEATINE_000_042<tab>スギの木のような……弟さんでした。
生真面目で……まっすぐで……。
しかし、スギ材は乾燥を誤ると、すぐ割れるもの……。

source: TEXT_SUBPST013_01573_BEATINE_000_043<tab>You seek Jandelaine, too, yes? Pray watch over this brother of his─I trust this journey will take him further than he can even imagine. And send my regards to Severian...
target:
TEXT_SUBPST013_01573_BEATINE_000_043<tab>貴方も、ジャンドゥレーヌさんを……お探しでしたよね。
よければ、弟さんを……見守ってあげてください。
錬金術師ギルドの「セヴェリアン」さんを訪ねるついでに……。

source: TEXT_SUBPST013_01573_BEATINE_000_049<tab>Jandelaine presiding over his lands from the cold, vast chambers of a manse in Ishgard. If one were to plant an island palm amidst the snowy drifts of Ishgard, I wonder how it might fare?
target:
TEXT_SUBPST013_01573_BEATINE_000_049<tab>イシュガルドの豪邸で、執務するジャンドゥレーヌさん……
雪深いイシュガルドに……南国の椰子を植えたら……
どうなってしまうんでしょう！？

source: TEXT_SUBPST013_01573_GUILLEFRESNE_000_049<tab>This stubborn fool will tell me nothing! I daresay conversing with the walls of Snowcloak would prove more fruitful!
target:
TEXT_SUBPST013_01573_GUILLEFRESNE_000_049<tab>……なんて頑固な男だ、私の言葉がまるで通じない。
スノークローク大氷壁よりも頭が固いのではないか……。

source: TEXT_SUBPST013_01573_SEVERIAN_000_050<tab>You, too, come in search of Jandelaine? Do I look like the man's mother? He had business here, and that business is now done. He has moved on, and I suggest the two of you do the same. I need not tell you that I am a busy man.
target:
TEXT_SUBPST013_01573_SEVERIAN_000_050<tab>……なんと、お前までジャンドゥレーヌ探しか？
弟にも言ったが、ここはヤツの家ではない！
ヤツは用が済むなり、さっさと次の目的地へ向かったぞ。

source: TEXT_SUBPST013_01573_GUILLEFRESNE_000_051<tab>How many times must I repeat myself!? Simply tell me where my brother has gone, and I will be glad to leave you to your dabblings and tinkerings.
target:
TEXT_SUBPST013_01573_GUILLEFRESNE_000_051<tab>ですから、その目的地を教えてください！
……何度言ったら、わかってくれるんですか！？

source: TEXT_SUBPST013_01573_GUILLEFRESNE_000_052<tab>Bah! I beg of you, friend, talk some sense into this man! Surely in your capacity as the postmoogle's assistant, your words carry some authority!?
target:
TEXT_SUBPST013_01573_GUILLEFRESNE_000_052<tab>配達士さんからも、頼んでください！
さっきから懇願しているのですが、埒があかないのです。

source: TEXT_SUBPST013_01573_SEVERIAN_000_053<tab>The order could come from the sultana herself, and I would say nothing! Sending a man of such rare genius off to some musty, dreary Ishgardian manse? Why, the mere thought makes my blood boil! If you care so much for your family demesne, go defend it yourself!
target:
TEXT_SUBPST013_01573_SEVERIAN_000_053<tab>答えん、断じて答えんぞ……！
ヤツをイシュガルドに押し込めるなど、笑止千万！
家門が大切と言うなら、自分で守ればいいではないか。

source: TEXT_SUBPST013_01573_GUILLEFRESNE_000_054<tab>Would that I could! But I fear I am not─and never have been─my brother's equal.
target:
TEXT_SUBPST013_01573_GUILLEFRESNE_000_054<tab>……私に、そのような手腕などありません！
私は、なにひとつ兄上の足元に及びませんから。

source: TEXT_SUBPST013_01573_SEVERIAN_000_055<tab>Yes, any half-wit could see that. Jandelaine is possessed of both a brilliant mind and an insatiable curiosity─a combination I have rarely seen in any but myself.
target:
TEXT_SUBPST013_01573_SEVERIAN_000_055<tab>……うむ、確かにヤツは偉大だな！
だが、それは飽くなき探求精神ゆえ。
古くさい宗教都市では、価値ある化学反応など望めん！

source: TEXT_SUBPST013_01573_SEVERIAN_000_056<tab>You, on the other hand, are about as sharp as a sack of rocks, and half as interesting. If there's anyone fit to being bound by the stuffy traditions of your homeland, I daresay it's you.
target:
TEXT_SUBPST013_01573_SEVERIAN_000_056<tab>それに引き替え……お前は、実につまらん弟だな。
凡庸で、革新性の欠片も見られん……。
伝統なんぞに縛られるとしたら、お前の方が適任だ。

source: TEXT_SUBPST013_01573_SEVERIAN_000_057<tab>...But wait. Yes...yes, of <var 1A 02 /var>course<var 1A 01 /var>! I take back everything I said earlier. By all means, go seek out your brother! Indeed, I urge you to do so with all haste!
target:
TEXT_SUBPST013_01573_SEVERIAN_000_057<tab>……いや待て。
ふむ……そうか……そうなのだ、弟！
お前は、やはり兄に即刻会うべきだ！

source: TEXT_SUBPST013_01573_SEVERIAN_000_058<tab>Jandelaine set off for the Adventurers' Guild in Limsa Lominsa. Make your way there at once, lest I pour some acid down your trousers to speed you on your way!
target:
TEXT_SUBPST013_01573_SEVERIAN_000_058<tab>お前の兄ならば、今頃、
リムサ・ロミンサの冒険者ギルド付近にいるだろう。
さあ弟よ、いますぐ駆けつけるがいい！

source: TEXT_SUBPST013_01573_GUILLEFRESNE_000_059<tab>...Ahem. I know not what led to this change of heart, my good man, and yet I thank you for seeing reason. Good day.
target:
TEXT_SUBPST013_01573_GUILLEFRESNE_000_059<tab>……唐突な心変わりの理由は理解に苦しみますが、
兄の居場所を教えていただき、感謝します。
それでは、私はこれにて……。

source: TEXT_SUBPST013_01573_SEVERIAN_000_060<tab>Mwahaha! Mwahahahahahaha! The boy is a fool, but he is an <var 1A 02 /var>amusing<var 1A 01 /var> fool, which I must say is the best kind.
target:
TEXT_SUBPST013_01573_SEVERIAN_000_060<tab>ふふ……ふははは！
……弟め……ヤツにぞんぶんに切り刻まれるがいい！

source: TEXT_SUBPST013_01573_SEVERIAN_000_061<tab>And you, what are you still doing here? Were you not after Jandelaine yourself? Off to Limsa with you! I suspect there will be quite the show, and you'll not want to be late.
target:
TEXT_SUBPST013_01573_SEVERIAN_000_061<tab>おっと……お前もジャンドゥレーヌに用があるのだろう？
ならば、さっさとリムサ・ロミンサへ行くがいい！

source: TEXT_SUBPST013_01573_SEVERIAN_000_065<tab>Mwahaha! Mwahahahahahaha! The boy is a fool, but he is an <var 1A 02 /var>amusing<var 1A 01 /var> fool, which I must say is the best kind.
target:
TEXT_SUBPST013_01573_SEVERIAN_000_065<tab>ふふ……ふははは！
……弟め……ヤツにぞんぶんに切り刻まれるがいい！

source: TEXT_SUBPST013_01573_SEVERIAN_000_066<tab>But you, were you not after Jandelaine yourself? Off to Limsa with you! I suspect there will be quite the show, and you'll not want to be late.
target:
TEXT_SUBPST013_01573_SEVERIAN_000_066<tab>おっと、お前もジャンドゥレーヌに用があるのだろう？
ならば、さっさとリムサ・ロミンサへ行くがいい！

source: TEXT_SUBPST013_01573_GUILLEFRESNE_000_070<tab>I have traveled long and far, and finally I have found you! Do you hear me, Brother? Father needs our help, and none save you can follow in his proud footsteps!
target:
TEXT_SUBPST013_01573_GUILLEFRESNE_000_070<tab>今日こそは、イシュガルドへ連れ帰りますよ……！
病の父上に無理をさせるわけにはいきません。
兄上なくして、誰が父上を助けるのですか！？

source: TEXT_SUBPST013_01573_JANDELAINE_000_070<tab>A letter? For me? As you can see, I am somewhat...occupied...at the moment, but for you, darling? Anything!
target:
TEXT_SUBPST013_01573_JANDELAINE_000_070<tab>よう、オメーか……オレに手紙だと？
見てのとおり、弟との再会で修羅場ってんだが……
オメーに免じて、受け取ってやんよ！

source: TEXT_SUBPST013_01573_GUILLEFRESNE_000_071<tab>Remarkable, friend! To travel the realm thrice over to deliver my missive to my brother. You are a true exemplar to messengers everywhere!
target:
TEXT_SUBPST013_01573_GUILLEFRESNE_000_071<tab>配達士さん、ありがとうございます！
……私は今、改めて感動しました。
困難を乗り越えて、配達という使命を果たす人の姿に！

source: TEXT_SUBPST013_01573_JANDELAINE_000_072<tab>Well spoken, brother mine! I have found myself quite taken with this adventurer as well. It is as if we share a mind!
target:
TEXT_SUBPST013_01573_JANDELAINE_000_072<tab>さすがはオレの弟だぁ、気が合うな！
まったく同感だぜ。

source: TEXT_SUBPST013_01573_GUILLEFRESNE_000_073<tab>If you feel this way, Brother, then why do you resist your calling!? Father needs you! <var 1A 02 /var>I<var 1A 01 /var> need you! How long do you intend to persist in this folly!?
target:
TEXT_SUBPST013_01573_GUILLEFRESNE_000_073<tab>でしたら、兄上も使命を果たしてください！
床に伏した父上に、いつまで無理をさせるつもりですか！？

source: TEXT_SUBPST013_01573_JANDELAINE_000_074<tab>When did you become such a dreadful bore, dear brother? Have the chill winds of our homeland frozen the heart that once beat inside you?
target:
TEXT_SUBPST013_01573_JANDELAINE_000_074<tab>久方ぶりの再会だっつーのに、ずいぶんな対応だな。
品行方正がウリのオメーらしさ、どこにいっちまった？

source: TEXT_SUBPST013_01573_GUILLEFRESNE_000_075<tab>I am simply answering the call of family and duty─a call that I ask you to heed as well. You are the eldest son. None save you can carry on the family line...
target:
TEXT_SUBPST013_01573_GUILLEFRESNE_000_075<tab>長い間、家を顧みることなく、
遊び呆けている貴方に、尽くす礼なぞありません！
引きずってでも、イシュガルドへ連れ帰りますよ！

source: TEXT_SUBPST013_01573_JANDELAINE_000_076<tab>In these five years, the child I knew has grown into a man. And yet, there is an unsightliness about you. This meekness, this timidity does not befit you. My hands tingle in disgust!
target:
TEXT_SUBPST013_01573_JANDELAINE_000_076<tab>しばらく見ぬ間に、オメーは成長したようだ。
だが……オメーは今、最高に生きてるか？
本当の自分を生きてんのかっ！？

source: TEXT_SUBPST013_01573_JANDELAINE_000_077<tab>Just as I live, this unspeakable embodiment of ugliness must die. Begone, foul demon!
target:
TEXT_SUBPST013_01573_JANDELAINE_000_077<tab>オメーの人生、ザックザクに切り刻んでやんよ！
キィィイイルゥゥゥ　オア　ダイッ！

source: TEXT_SUBPST013_01573_GUILLEFRESNE_000_078<tab>B-Brother? What is this you say...?
target:
TEXT_SUBPST013_01573_GUILLEFRESNE_000_078<tab>……あ、兄上？
ちょ、ちょっと……ま、まさかっ！？

source: TEXT_SUBPST013_01573_GUILLEFRESNE_000_079<tab>Ye gads, no! Aieeeeeeeeeeee!
target: TEXT_SUBPST013_01573_GUILLEFRESNE_000_079<tab>ぎやああああああああああ！！！

source: TEXT_SUBPST013_01573_JANDELAINE_000_080<tab>Hair extensions woven from the tail hair of a jet black Eastern steed! A mustache plucked from a mighty behemoth's mane! Tell me, Brother, how do you feel!?
target:
TEXT_SUBPST013_01573_JANDELAINE_000_080<tab>どうだ……新世界に生まれ変わった気分はよ？
……バラ色だろ？

source: TEXT_SUBPST013_01573_GUILLEFRESNE_000_081<tab>Why, it is as if the shadows of self-doubt have been purged from my soul, cast away by the light of a singular, unwavering confidence!
target:
TEXT_SUBPST013_01573_GUILLEFRESNE_000_081<tab>なんだ……この感覚は……？
私には、ありもしないと思っていた威厳と風格……
そして、自信が心の底からみなぎってくる……。

source: TEXT_SUBPST013_01573_GUILLEFRESNE_000_082<tab>Where once stood a faltering child, now stands a man brave and bold! Who knew that long locks and facial hair could be so empowering? It is as if I have died and been born anew!
target:
TEXT_SUBPST013_01573_GUILLEFRESNE_000_082<tab>まるで、生まれ変わったかのような気分だ……。
兄を追い続けていた私が見えていなかった……
これが……本当の……私……。

source: TEXT_SUBPST013_01573_JANDELAINE_000_083<tab>Just so, Brother! You were always meant to follow in Father's footsteps, just as I was to pursue this path of my own. I have simply brought out the man that was always inside you.
target:
TEXT_SUBPST013_01573_JANDELAINE_000_083<tab>そうだッ！　今この瞬間、オメーは新しく生まれ変わった。
だから今日は、オメーの誕生日だッ！

source: TEXT_SUBPST013_01573_JANDELAINE_000_084<tab>A most happy nameday, to a brother reborn!
target: TEXT_SUBPST013_01573_JANDELAINE_000_084<tab>誕生日おめでとさん！

source: TEXT_SUBPST013_01573_GUILLEFRESNE_000_085<tab>The words of Masters Beatin and Severian... It all seems so clear now! Good gods, how could I have been so blind!?
target:
TEXT_SUBPST013_01573_GUILLEFRESNE_000_085<tab>……そうか、そういうことか。
ベアティヌさんとセヴェリアンさんの真意を……
私は今、ようやく理解しました……。

source: TEXT_SUBPST013_01573_GUILLEFRESNE_000_086<tab>Forgive me for making mock of your art, Brother. The people of this realm need you, that much is clear. Worry not for Father, or for our lands─yes, I shall return to Ishgard and do our family proud!
target:
TEXT_SUBPST013_01573_GUILLEFRESNE_000_086<tab>兄上……貴方はすごい人だ。
家のことは、私が責任を持ってみせます！
だから兄上は、これからも多くの人を切り刻んであげてください！

source: TEXT_SUBPST013_01573_GUILLEFRESNE_000_087<tab>For all those years that I looked to my brother with admiration, I never truly comprehended his greatness until this day. For this, I have you to thank, friend. Till our paths cross again!
target:
TEXT_SUBPST013_01573_GUILLEFRESNE_000_087<tab>やはり、兄上……ジャンドゥレーヌは私の自慢で憧れです。
私も、自分で選んだ使命を、きっと果たしてみせます。
兄上や、配達士さんに負けないように！

source: TEXT_SUBPST013_01573_SYSTEM_000_000<tab>With your successful delivery, your reputation as a letter carrier has grown!
target:
TEXT_SUBPST013_01573_SYSTEM_000_000<tab>先輩レターモーグリから託された手紙の配達に成功したため、
「配達士」として成長しました！

source: TEXT_SUBPST013_01573_GOFUJINN_000_024<tab>
target: TEXT_SUBPST013_01573_GOFUJINN_000_024<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）
